EmailTemplate.name: Northwest Training Invite
EmailTemplate.subject: ASA Training Event
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Northwest Training Event!
National FFELP guarantor American Student Assistance has designed an all-day training event to discuss some of the hottest topics affecting financial aid offices!
Sessions Include: * The Basics of FERPA and GLB Featuring Internet Security * Top 10 Financial Aid Pitfalls and How to Avoid Them * What's My Communication Style?
To reserve your seat or for more information, please visit www.amsa.com/events or contact ASA's Northwest account executive, Kelley Bauman, at 800-999-9080 ext. 6248 or kbauman@amsa.com.
